languages.text: Вольный Торговец обращается к высочайшим умам магосов-Эксплораторов, дабы благословенные машины Адептус Механикус растопили многовековую толщу льда на утерянном и всеми забытом имперском мире. Что есть непосильная ноша для обычного жителя Империума, то лишь очередная задача для служителя Омниссии. Эксплораторы возносят молитвы машинным духам, готовясь к необычной миссии планетарного масштаба.

traits.locale_text: Вольный Торговец обращается к высочайшим умам магосов-эксплораторов, дабы благословенные машины Адептус Механикус растопили многовековую толщу льда на утерянном и всеми забытом имперском мире. Что есть непосильная ноша для обычного жителя Империума, то лишь очередная задача для служителя Омниссии. Эксплораторы возносят молитвы машинным духам, готовясь к необычной миссии планетарного масштаба.

languages.text: The Rogue Trader has turned to the sublime minds of the Magi Explorators; may they employ the blessed machines of the Adeptus Mechanicus to melt the centuries-old layer of ice encasing a lost and forgotten Imperial world. What would be an unbearable burden for a commoner is just another task for a servant of the Omnissiah. The Explorators offer prayers to the machine spirits as they prepare for this unorthodox planetary-scale mission.

Что есть непосильная ноша для обычного жителя Империума, то лишь очередная задача для служителя Омниссии. What would be an unbearable burden for an Imperial commoner is just another task for a servant of the Omnissiah. The Explorators offer prayers to the machine spirits as they prepare for this unorthodox planetary-scale mission.

The Rogue Trader has turned to the sublime minds of the Magi Explorators; may they employ the blessed machines of the Adeptus Mechanicus to melt the centuries-old layer of ice encasing a lost and forgotten Imperial world. What would be an unbearable burden for a commoner is just another task for a servant of the Omnissiah. The Explorators offer prayers to the machine spirits as they prepare for this unorthodox planetary-scale mission.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha vuelto a acudir a las sublimes mentes de los magos exploradores. La idea es que usen las benditas máquinas del Adeptus Mechanicus para derretir los siglos de hielo que cubren un mundo Imperial perdido y olvidado. Lo que sería una carga insoportable para un plebeyo es una tarea más para un sirviente del Omnissiah. Los exploradores ofrecen plegarias a los espíritus máquina mientras preparan esta singular misión de escala planetaria.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has turned to the sublime minds of the Magi Explorators; may they employ the blessed machines of the Adeptus Mechanicus to melt the centuries-old layer of ice encasing a lost and forgotten Imperial world. What would be an unbearable burden for a commoner is just another task for a servant of the Omnissiah. The Explorators offer prayers to the machine spirits as they prepare for this unorthodox planetary-scale mission.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha vuelto a acudir a las sublimes mentes de los magos exploradores. La idea es que usen las benditas máquinas del Adeptus Mechanicus para derretir los siglos de hielo que cubren un mundo Imperial perdido y olvidado. Lo que sería una carga insoportable para un plebeyo del Imperium es una tarea más para un sirviente del Omnissiah. Los exploradores ofrecen plegarias a los espíritus máquina mientras preparan esta singular misión de escala planetaria.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} en appelle aux esprits suprêmes des Magi Explorators, qui emploieront les machines sacrées de l'Adeptus Mechanicus pour faire fondre la couche de glace séculaire recouvrant un monde impérial oublié. Ce qui s'apparenterait à un défi insurmontable pour le commun des mortels n'est qu'une tâche comme les autres pour un serviteur de l'Omnimessie. Les Explorators adressent des prières aux esprits de la machine en vue de cette mission peu orthodoxe à l'échelle planétaire.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has turned to the sublime minds of the Magi Explorators; may they employ the blessed machines of the Adeptus Mechanicus to melt the centuries-old layer of ice encasing a lost and forgotten Imperial world. What would be an unbearable burden for a commoner is just another task for a servant of the Omnissiah. The Explorators offer prayers to the machine spirits as they prepare for this unorthodox planetary-scale mission.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} en appelle aux esprits suprêmes des Magi Explorators, qui emploieront les machines sacrées de l'Adeptus Mechanicus pour faire fondre la couche de glace séculaire recouvrant un monde impérial oublié. Ce qui s'apparenterait à un défi insurmontable pour le commun des mortels n'est qu'une tâche comme les autres pour un serviteur de l'Omnimessie. Les Explorators adressent des prières aux esprits de la machine en vue de cette mission peu orthodoxe à l'échelle planétaire.

languages.text: 行商浪人转而求助于开拓者的卓越智慧，愿他们能驱动机械修会的神圣机器，融化数个世纪的坚冰，拯救这个被长久遗落的帝国世界。对于普通人而言，这简直是天方夜谭，但对欧姆尼塞亚的仆人而言，这不过只是个普通的任务罢了。他们向机魂献上了祈祷，随后开始执行这项行星规模的特殊任务。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has turned to the sublime minds of the Magi Explorators; may they employ the blessed machines of the Adeptus Mechanicus to melt the centuries-old layer of ice encasing a lost and forgotten Imperial world. What would be an unbearable burden for a commoner is just another task for a servant of the Omnissiah. The Explorators offer prayers to the machine spirits as they prepare for this unorthodox planetary-scale mission.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人转而求助于开拓者的卓越智慧，愿他们能驱动机械修会的神圣机器，融化数个世纪的坚冰，拯救这个被长久遗落的帝国世界。对于普通人而言，这简直是天方夜谭，但对欧姆尼塞亚的仆人而言，这不过只是个普通的任务罢了。他们向机魂献上了祈祷，随后开始执行这项行星规模的特殊任务。

languages.text: ローグトレーダーは、賢人探査団の優れた精神へと目を向けた。彼らは、帝国技術局の祝福されし機械を用いて、失われ、忘れ去られたインペリアルワールドの何世紀も前の氷を溶かすことができるだろうか。帝国の一般市民にとっては耐え難い重荷であっても万機神のしもべにとっては単なる仕事のひとつに過ぎない。探検団はこの異例の惑星規模の任務に備え、機械精霊へと祈りを捧げる。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has turned to the sublime minds of the Magi Explorators; may they employ the blessed machines of the Adeptus Mechanicus to melt the centuries-old layer of ice encasing a lost and forgotten Imperial world. What would be an unbearable burden for a commoner is just another task for a servant of the Omnissiah. The Explorators offer prayers to the machine spirits as they prepare for this unorthodox planetary-scale mission.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーは、賢人探査団の優れた精神へと目を向けた。彼らは、帝国技術局の祝福されし機械を用いて、失われ、忘れ去られたインペリアルワールドの何世紀も前の氷を溶かすことができるだろうか。帝国の一般市民にとっては耐え難い重荷であっても万機神のしもべにとっては単なる仕事のひとつに過ぎない。探検団はこの異例の惑星規模の任務に備え、機械精霊へと祈りを捧げる。

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat den erhabenen Verstand der Explorator-Magi angerufen. Mögen sie die gesegneten Maschinen des Adeptus Mechanicus einsetzen, um die jahrhundertealte Schicht aus Eis wegzuschmelzen, die eine verlorene und vergessene imperiale Welt umschließt. Was für einen Bürger eine unerträgliche Last wäre, ist für einen Diener der Omnissiah eine ganz alltägliche Aufgabe. Die Exploratoren beten zu den Maschinengeistern, während sie sich auf diese unorthodoxe Mission von planetaren Ausmaßen vorbereiten.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has turned to the sublime minds of the Magi Explorators; may they employ the blessed machines of the Adeptus Mechanicus to melt the centuries-old layer of ice encasing a lost and forgotten Imperial world. What would be an unbearable burden for a commoner is just another task for a servant of the Omnissiah. The Explorators offer prayers to the machine spirits as they prepare for this unorthodox planetary-scale mission.

Die Exploratoren beten zu den Maschinengeistern, während sie sich auf diese unorthodoxe Mission von planetaren Ausmaßen vorbereiten.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, Keşiftör Magoslarının yüce aklına danışmaya karar verdi. Kayıp ve unutulmuş bir İmparatorluk dünyasını saran yüzlerce yıllık buz tabakasını eritme vazifelerinde Adeptus Mechanicus'un kutsanmış makineleri yardımcıları olsun. Sıradan yurttaşlara ağır gelen yükler, Hermesih'in hizmetkârları için yeni bir ödevden ibarettir. Keşiftörler, gezegen ölçeğindeki bu alışılmışın dışındaki göreve hazırlanırken makine ruhlarına dualarını sunuyorlar.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has turned to the sublime minds of the Magi Explorators; may they employ the blessed machines of the Adeptus Mechanicus to melt the centuries-old layer of ice encasing a lost and forgotten Imperial world. What would be an unbearable burden for a commoner is just another task for a servant of the Omnissiah. The Explorators offer prayers to the machine spirits as they prepare for this unorthodox planetary-scale mission.
